doc.title: BigInt

value.content: In JavaScript, BigInt is a numeric data type that can represent integers in the arbitrary precision format. In other programming languages different numeric types can exist, for examples: Integers, Floats, Doubles, or Bignums.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Numeric types on Wikipedia
  • The JavaScript type: BigInt
  • The JavaScript global object BigInt
